reviews.review: Increible no puedo decir nada mas, un cago de risa wheatley y glados la verdad una experiencia que hay que jugarla si o si.
一代神作了，剧情跌宕起伏，演出特效炸裂，这游戏放在哪一年都是吊打其他游戏的存在，不愧是从不翻车的v社，就是不知道什么时候数3

It hurts my head :(
still good

Добро пожаловать, добро пожаловать в Aperture science!
Сами вы выбрали его, или его выбрали за вас - это лучшая лаборатория, в отличии от Black Mesa. Я такого высокого мнения о Aperture science, что разместил здесь ебанутого робота, который отравит вас нейротоксином, а позже пошутит над вашеми биологическими родителями. Здесь безопасно.
круто мешать своему другу проходить испытания, стоп, значит вы очень очень любите испытания
game is amazing would recommend has good back story i played for 92 hours so valve where is portal 3
I do prefer portal 1 and I thought the game was more fun but this game has an amazing continuation of the story, the co-op is the best part of this game and is so much fun to play with a friend
Un muy buen juego, totalmente entretenido y desafiante. Recomendado.
this is so good im glad i sold a tf2 unusual for this
it's pretty fun ngl, played through main part co-op on x360 with some french person. custom tests are fun as hell tbh. solid 11/10 IGN rating
Jogo muito bom! No finalzinho estava começando a ficar meio sem graça, mais do mesmo, tava monótono, mas o final foi bom.
Very cool, buy it on discount
its very entertaining and is a good way to pass time
this is my fav game of all time i have like 4 copies  and over +500  hours
i played this with my friend, who is an idiot. so we went nowhere. fun game tho.
makes you simultaneously feel like a monkey and a genius 10/10.
Best game I have played. Great story and acting. I recommend this to everyone
Weird how a puzzle game can make you feel all this

Excelente jogo para jogar sozinho ou acompanhado. Os níveis são muito bem construídos, a dublagem é excelente, os personagens são carismáticos e a curva de aprendizado do jogo é muito boa, fazendo você se sentir um gênio em alguns momentos (quando na verdade você apenas aprendeu a maneira correta de jogar).
same mechanics as first game, but longer. At 3 hours, ive already played portal two for longer than ive played portal one
Tesla, Einstein ve ben değilseniz bence bitiremezsiniz
valve просто топ они умеют делать игры у меня есtь left4dead2 garrys mod csgo portal2)))
havent fully played through it, but the game is amazing, highly recommended to play!
This game is amazing. I can't describe how much I love it.
i hate wheatley he is the most perplexing character in the game i dont think he speaks english
игры просто супер красивая графика(играл на ультрах на слабом пк),геймплей,сюжет все на высоте 10/10
Un diseño de niveles bastante divertido y mecánicas simples pero únicas, un multijugador muy divertido con amigos.

la verdad no me cabe duda es un juego excepcional , siempre es bueno comprar el portal 2 , aunque el 1 tambien es bueno .

si lo que deseas es comprar los dos te recomendaría comprar el paquete que contiene los dos juegos, pero como recomendación solo hazlo cuando este en descuento así te ahorras dinero .

Ahora para los que aun tienen su duda si , trae incluido la workshop ,y el modo cooperativo .

como dije antes,  recomendadisimo .
my brain just gained a kilogram of brain mass
I think everyone already know this is a very good game, i won't explain but i recomend it !
Классная игра, с интересным сюжетом. Всем кто не играл - советую!)
yes that's all i have to say is yes
интересная, но сложная для моих трёх извилин((((
Не дают ставить порталы из порталов, хнык(
一款很不错的游戏无论是游戏玩法还是剧情就算是放在今天也是很不错的

An absolutely amazing game. The story is fantastic, though i recommend to buy and play the game Portal before you play Portal 2, so you understand the story better. It's not too hard, it does crack your brain sometimes, but it's not irritating. The testing chambers all look pretty good (especially test chamber 20 ;)) and not confusing. Overall it's an amazing game and i would definetly recommend it!
лучшая игра на все времена, эта игра не устареет никогда
this is probably my favorite game of all time after all the other games i've played this is the best for both singleplayer story as for mutiplayer shenanigans
Jogo curtinho mas bem divertido, dá pra passar o tempo incrivelmente além de arrumar brigas com seu amigo ao longo do jogo. nota 10/10
